org.usfirst.frc.team2077.video.interfaces

Interface Rendering

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultRendering

    public interface Rendering
    Rendered video feed from one source to one view.

    A RenderedView may contain multiple renderings, each of which is an association between the view and a single VideoSource. The rendering defines a mapping from pixels in the view's image back to the pixels its source video frames from which they are to be populated. Whenever a new frame from arrives from the source, it is used to update the whichever pixels in the view image are mapped from its rendering.

    Â© 2018

    Author:
    FRC Team 2077, R. A. Buchanan
